mapper.insert: insert into teammatching (homeName, region, possibleDate, possibleTime, homePlace, headCount, comment, homePerson) values(#{homeName}, #{region}, #{possibleDate}, #{possibleTime}, #{homePlace}, #{headCount}, #{comment}, #{homePerson})
mapper.select: select * from teammatching where region=#{region} and possibleDate=#{possibleDate} and awayName is null and registration=0 order by teammatching.possibleTime
select * from teammatching where possibleDate=#{possibleDate} and awayName is null order by teammatching.possibleTime
mapper.update: update teammatching set awayName=#{awayName}, awayPerson=#{awayPerson} where seq=#{seq}
update teammatching set registration=1 where seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: select homePerson from teammatching where seq=#{seq}
mapper.insert: insert into alarm (homeName, awayName, region, possibleDate, possibleTime, homePlace, alarmDate) values(#{homeName}, #{awayName}, #{region}, #{possibleDate}, #{possibleTime}, #{homePlace}, #{alarmDate})
